what_is.question: What is Web Memo?
what_is.answer: Web Memo is an intelligent note-taking service that revolutionizes internet browsing. • Instantly memo important parts while reading articles • AI-powered automatic summarization of YouTube videos • Save interesting content to your wishlist Unlike regular bookmarks, it's a completely new approach to knowledge management where you can record your own thoughts and insights systematically.

is_free.question: Is it free?
is_free.answer: Yes! All core features of Web Memo are completely free: • Unlimited memo storage • AI-powered content summarization • Category organization features • Wishlist management • YouTube caption summarization • Mobile app with data synchronization We are committed to providing a great service experience without ads or paid subscriptions.

how_to_use.question: How do I use the service?
how_to_use.answer: You can use Web Memo by installing the Chrome extension. Once installed, you can open the side panel on any website to start taking notes.

where_to_save.question: Where can I save memos?
where_to_save.answer: Web Memo works everywhere on the internet! Install the Chrome extension and you can: â€¢ Take notes on blogs and news sites â€¢ Organize content from online courses and educational materials â€¢ Record insights from YouTube videos â€¢ Save information from shopping or product review sites â€¢ Summarize key points from research papers Simply press Alt+S (Windows) / Option+S (Mac) to open the side panel and start taking notes immediately.

ai_summary.question: How does the AI summary feature work?
ai_summary.answer: The AI summary feature automatically analyzes the content of the webpage or YouTube video you're viewing and summarizes the key points. For YouTube, it summarizes based on video captions, and for webpages, it analyzes the main text content. When you open the side panel, the summary starts automatically, helping you quickly grasp the essentials of long content.

data_sync.question: Can I sync my memos across multiple devices?
data_sync.answer: Yes! When you log in to Web Memo, all your memos are automatically saved to the cloud. You can access and edit all your memos from any deviceâ€”PC, laptop, tabletâ€”by logging in with the same account. You can also view your saved memos anytime at webmemo.site.

supported_browsers.question: Which browsers are supported?
supported_browsers.answer: Currently, Web Memo is available on Chrome and Chrome-based browsers (Edge, Brave, Arc, etc.). Simply install the extension from the Chrome Web Store to get started. Support for Firefox and Safari is coming soonâ€”stay tuned!
